name: Chicken Ceasar Salad Tacos
ingredients: 10 ounces Romaine Lettuce ½ Cup canned black beans
2 Cups shredded Cheddar Cheese 1/3 Cup Ceasar salad dressing
1 4oz can Ortega Diced Green Chiles Chunky Salsa
steps: Cooked chicken cubed ¼ Cup frozen whole kernel corn
Combine chicken, cheese, chiles, beans, corn and dressing in a large bowl, mix well. Fill each taco shell
